C1 very great and rare natural ability or skill, especially in a particular area such as science or art, or a person who has this: (an) artistic/creative/musical genius Einstein was a (mathematical) genius. From the age of three, she showed signs of genius.stroke of genius It was such a brilliant idea - a real stroke of genius.

a person who has a strong bad influence over other people: The film was about an evil genius who wanted to control the world.
